title: What do we learn in cse core???
content: I just wanted to know what's the syllabus coz I heard there are updates in the syllabus each year. So i wanted to know what will I learn in my first year of cse engeneering??

comments.body: You will learn common subjects in the first 2 sems, it will be divided into phy cycle and chem cycle. Phy cycle has mechanical science, physics, EEE, EVS and chem cycle will have mechanical Statics, EPD, constitution, chemistry and with that you will have common subjects as maths 1 and math 2 and cs(python and C)

In your first year of CS engineering, you will get to study core CS courses such as Physics, Chemistry, Math 1 and 2, Electrical, Electronics, Mechanics and Mechanical. Wait, almost forgot, you will also need to study the Constitution and EVS.

First year syllabus is common for all branches. You will study all the courses I mentioned, along with Python and C. If you are referring to your *actual* first year in CS, you will have (unless the syllabus changes again) computer organisation, web tech, statistics, data structures and another course which I cannot seem to remember.
Based on the alphabet your name starts with, my name starts with A so I was in chem cycle first sem and physics the next
Alright. Thank you for the reply.
